""Go Back100 Day Transformation Videos / PhotosPosted 2 hours agoWorldwideI have an app focused on helping people stick with a habit for 100 days. Since I just launched it, I do not have many reviews/testimonials of people using the product, I'm looking to Upwork to find people willing to use the app and create a 100-day transformation type of content that I can post on the brand's social media.Now the transformation can be anything (learning a new skill, doing something consistently, or working towards some type of goal). I will just need photos and videos of you along the process so that I can edit it together and post it on the account.Given the nature of the job, you're willing for me to post the content on your behalf and it could even be shorter than the 100 days, just as a way of starting the process for creating the content in the first place.----There is another option where I will pay for transformation photos or videos of skills you have already done. This is where you've learned a skill and have proof previously. Price depends on the quality of the videos and photos.Budget: $10Posted On: February 19, 2024 06:05 UTCCategory: Video EditingSkills:Videography, Video ProductionSkills: Videography, Video ProductionCountry: United Arab Emirates""

Google Analytics into the website.Responsibilities:- Perform a comprehensive SEO audit, optimization and implementation including keyword research, content analysis, on-page optimization, SERPs analysis, and image alt tag optimization.- Conduct GSC and Google Analytics analysis to identify areas for improvement and track website performance.- Submit on-site blog optimization recommendations and implement approved changes.- Develop and execute link building strategies, including business directories, social profiles, competitor links, and tier link building.- Coordinate off-site blog posting for backlink acquisition and collaborate with content creators to ensure quality content.- Analyze backlinks for quality and relevance, and implement necessary actions for improvement.- Conduct website page speed analysis and provide recommendations for optimization.- Evaluate XML sitemap and robots.txt files for efficiency and make necessary adjustments.- Identify and fix broken links to improve user experience and search engine crawlability.- Assess mobile-friendliness of the website and provide recommendations for improvement if required.- Generate a monthly SEO report detailing progress, key metrics, and recommendations for ongoing optimization.One-time Setup:- Set up Google Search Console (GSC) to monitor website performance and indexing status.- Integrate Google ""Job Title: Embedded Systems Developer for Lilygo ESP32 A7670E GSM Module ProjectJob Description:We are seeking a skilled Embedded Systems Developer with expertise in the Lilygo ESP32 A7670E GSM module for a short-term project. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing firmware to enable the ESP32 module to receive SMS messages through the GSM module and transmit specific data to an API endpoint.Key Responsibilities:• Develop, test, and optimize firmware for the Lilygo ESP32 A7670E GSM module to efficiently receive SMS messages.• Implement functionality within the ESP32 module to parse received SMS messages and perform predefined actions based on the message content.• Establish and maintain secure HTTP communication from the ESP32 module to a specified API endpoint for data transmission.• Ensure the stability and reliability of the system, with a focus on error handling and recovery mechanisms.• Collaborate with the project team to understand requirements, provide technical insights, and report on progress.• Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve any issues related to firmware, hardware integration, or communication protocols.• Document the development process, including code comments, system architecture, and setup instructions, to facilitate future maintenance and scalability.Required Skills and Qualifications:• Proven experience with the ESP32 microcontroller and its development environment.• Hands-on experience with the Lilygo ESP32 A7670E GSM module or similar GSM modules for embedded systems.• Proficiency in programming languages relevant to embedded systems development, particularly C/C++.• Solid understanding of GSM network protocols, SMS handling, and HTTP communication.• Familiarity with API integration and data exchange formats (e.g., JSON, XML).• Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to work independently and deliver solutions within tight deadlines.• Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders.• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field is preferred.Budget: $150Posted On: February 18, 2024 11:59 UTCCategory: Full Stack ""========================================Project Title: PowerShell Script for Importing CSV Files into Excel SheetsObjective: The objective of this project is to develop a PowerShell script that imports CSV files into Excel sheets based on specified parameters. The script should be able to handle numbered subdirectories, locate template Excel files, read corresponding map files, and print all parameters before execution.========================================Scope:The script will be developed using PowerShell scripting language.The script will accept a directory path as a parameter, representing the base directory where the operation will be performed.The script will loop through all numbered subdirectories (1,2,3,...) within the base directory.Within each subdirectory, the script will locate all CSV files and corresponding map files.Map files will be in the format of ".csv file name.map" and will contain two columns: XLS_SHEET and XLS_LINE.The script will locate the template Excel file (template.xlsx or template.xls) in a template directory, which is a subdirectory of the base directory.If multiple template files are found, the script will prioritize template.xlsx over template.xls.The script will copy the selected template file into each numbered subdirectory for subsequent operations.CSV files will be imported into different Excel sheets within the template file.Excel sheet names will be defined by the XLS_SHEET column in the corresponding map file.CSV files will be imported starting from the line specified in the XLS_LINE column of the map file.Before executing the import operation, the script will print all parameters for validation and debugging purposes.========================================Out of Scope:The script will not handle exceptions such as missing files or incorrect file formats beyond basic validation.The script will not perform any data validation or transformation on the imported data.The script will not modify the original CSV files or template Excel files.========================================Assumptions:The base directory provided as a parameter will contain numbered subdirectories.Each numbered subdirectory will contain CSV files and corresponding map files.Template Excel files will be located in a subdirectory named "template" within the base directory.CSV files and map files will have consistent naming conventions and formats.The script will be executed in a PowerShell environment where the ImportExcel module is installed and available.========================================Deliverables:PowerShell script file (import-csv-to-excel.ps1) implementing the specified functionality.Documentation including a scope document, usage instructions, and any additional notes deemed necessary.========================================Dependencies:PowerShell environment with access to the ImportExcel module.Proper permissions to read and write files within the specified directories.========================================Attachment are examples of 2 filesBudget: $50Posted On: February 13, 2024 18:18 UTCCategory: Data ExtractionSkills:Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Windows PowerShellSkills: Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Windows PowerShellCountry: United States""

This allows us to close the production process and for the system to accept these differences. We need to apply this in reverse, that is, to use 100% of the raw material but in this case, to produce more than 100% of the finished product.-We can use the same shrinkage workflow, simply reversing it, so to speak.
